verses.roman:
prasāda pāya vaiṣṇava-gaṇa bale, 'hari' 'hari'
hari hari dhvani uṭhe saba brahmāṇḍa bhari'

synonyms: prasāda—the prasāda; pāya—accept; vaiṣṇava-gaṇa—all the Vaiṣṇavas; bale—chant; hari hari—Hari, Hari; hari hari dhvani—the vibration of Hari, Hari; uṭhe—rises; saba brahmāṇḍa—the entire universe; bhari'-filling.
translation: Accepting the prasāda, all the Vaiṣṇavas chanted the holy names Hari, Hari. The rising vibration of the holy name of Hari filled the entire universe.
